description.narrative: El objetivo general del Programa es mejorar la eficiencia y transparencia en la gestión fiscal del Estado de Maranhao.
To better the efficiency and the transparency of the fiscal gestão, aiming at incrementing the state's own revenue and in increasing the effectiveness and quality of the state dispenses.
